content: Excluding the impact of asset acquisition accounting, in connection with the merger with MMLC, adjusted net investment income for the quarter was $0.65 per share equating to an annualized net investment income yield on book value of 17.8%. Net asset value per share decreased to $14.61 per share as of December 31, a decrease of approximately 2.7% from the end of the third quarter. As of December 31, 2022, total investments in our portfolio were $3.5 billion at fair value, comprised of 97.6% senior secured loans, including 89.3% in first lien, 3.3% first lien last-out unit tranche and 5.0% in second lien debt as well as a small amount of unsecured debt and 2.2% in a combination of preferred and common stock and warrants. We ended the fourth quarter and year ended 2022 with total portfolio investments at fair value of $3.5 billion, outstanding debt of $2 billion and net assets of $1.5 billion.
